column5: Are there other sites like CanadaMapSales.com to order lake maps for Ontario? I ordered Lac Seul, but I am wondering if ther are other maps with more detail I shoudl take a look at...

Me again. I would recommend the Explorer map series for Lac Seul. Scout Lake is in the northwest section. As far as I know this set of maps is the best available for Lac Seul. You can order it from Thorne Bros out of the Twin Cities. You can study it all winter, seems to make time go faster. Good luck.
Thanks just found them, looks like the map I had of Red lake, ON.

Yes, there are a few places that sell maps. Most are not the greatest and you can often get similar or better quality maps online for free from Anglers Atlas.I like this one:http://trakmaps.com/Search.aspx?Search=Lac+Seul
Call the Ontario Department of ??????????. I can't remember the name but I have the number. 807-854-2337They took our order and sent us the maps we wanted.
This site sells the same maps for less : http://www.maptown.com/
